verses.verse: Now this is the history of the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> (that <S%H123>is,<s%> Edom).

<S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H802>wives<s%> from the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan:<s%> <S%H5711>Adah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H356>Elon,<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite;<s%> and <S%H173>Oholibamah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6034>Anah,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6649>Zibeon,<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivite;<s%>
and <S%H1315>Basemath,<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> <S%H269>sister<s%> of <S%H5032>Nebaioth.<s%>
<S%H5711>Adah<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> to <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H464>Eliphaz.<s%> <S%H1315>Basemath<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H7467>Reuel.<s%>

<S%H173>Oholibamah<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H3274>Jeush,<s%> <S%H3281>Jalam,<s%> and <S%H7141>Korah.<s%> These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> who were <S%H3205>born<s%> to him in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>

<S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H802>wives,<s%> his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> his <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> and all the <S%H5315>members<s%> of his <S%H1004>household,<s%> with his <S%H4735>livestock,<s%> all his <S%H929>animals,<s%> and all his <S%H7075>possessions,<s%> which he had <S%H7408>gathered<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> into a <S%H776>land<s%> away <S%H6440>from<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

For their <S%H7399>substance<s%> was too <S%H7227>great<s%> for them to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H4033>travels<s%> <S%H3201>couldn't<s%> <S%H5375>bear<s%> them <S%H6440>because<s%> of their <S%H4735>livestock.<s%>
<S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> country of <S%H8165>Seir.<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> is <S%H123>Edom.<s%>
This is the history of the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H123>Edomites<s%> in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> country of <S%H8165>Seir:<s%>

these are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons:<s%> <S%H464>Eliphaz,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5711>Adah,<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau;<s%> and <S%H7467>Reuel,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1315>Basemath,<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> were <S%H8487>Teman,<s%> <S%H201>Omar,<s%> <S%H6825>Zepho,<s%> and <S%H1609>Gatam,<s%> and <S%H7073>Kenaz.<s%>

<S%H8555>Timna<s%> was <S%H6370>concubine<s%> to <S%H464>Eliphaz,<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%>'s <S%H1121>son;<s%> and she <S%H3205>bore<s%> to <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> <S%H6002>Amalek.<s%> These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5711>Adah,<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%>'s <S%H802>wife.<s%>

These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7467>Reuel:<s%> <S%H5184>Nahath,<s%> <S%H2226>Zerah,<s%> <S%H8048>Shammah,<s%> and <S%H4199>Mizzah.<s%> These were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1315>Basemath,<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%>'s <S%H802>wife.<s%>

These were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H173>Oholibamah,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6034>Anah,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6649>Zibeon,<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%>'s <S%H802>wife:<s%> she <S%H3205>bore<s%> to <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H3274>Jeush,<s%> <S%H3281>Jalam,<s%> and <S%H7141>Korah.<s%>

These are the <S%H441>chiefs<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau:<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau:<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H8487>Teman,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H201>Omar,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H6825>Zepho,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H7073>Kenaz,<s%>

<S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H1609>Gatam,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H6002>Amalek:<s%> these are the <S%H441>chiefs<s%> who came of <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Edom;<s%> these are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5711>Adah.<s%>

These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7467>Reuel,<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%>'s <S%H1121>son:<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H5184>Nahath,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H2226>Zerah,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H8048>Shammah,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H4199>Mizzah:<s%> these are the <S%H441>chiefs<s%> who came of <S%H7467>Reuel<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Edom;<s%> these are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1315>Basemath,<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%>'s <S%H802>wife.<s%>

These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H173>Oholibamah,<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%>'s <S%H802>wife:<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H3266>Jeush,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H3281>Jalam,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H7141>Korah:<s%> these are the <S%H441>chiefs<s%> who came of <S%H173>Oholibamah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6034>Anah,<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%>'s <S%H802>wife.<s%>
These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> (that <S%H123>is,<s%> Edom), and these are their <S%H441>chiefs.<s%>

These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8165>Seir<s%> the <S%H2752>Horite,<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land:<s%> <S%H3877>Lotan,<s%> <S%H7732>Shobal,<s%> <S%H6649>Zibeon,<s%> <S%H6034>Anah,<s%>

<S%H1787>Dishon,<s%> <S%H687>Ezer,<s%> and <S%H1789>Dishan.<s%> These are the <S%H441>chiefs<s%> who came of the <S%H2752>Horites,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8165>Seir<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Edom.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3877>Lotan<s%> were <S%H2753>Hori<s%> and <S%H1967>Heman.<s%> <S%H3877>Lotan<s%>'s <S%H269>sister<s%> was <S%H8555>Timna.<s%>
These are the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7732>Shobal:<s%> <S%H5935>Alvan,<s%> <S%H4506>Manahath,<s%> <S%H5858>Ebal,<s%> <S%H8195>Shepho,<s%> and <S%H208>Onam.<s%>

These are the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6649>Zibeon:<s%> <S%H345>Aiah<s%> and <S%H6034>Anah.<s%> This is <S%H6034>Anah<s%> who <S%H4672>found<s%> the hot <S%H3222>springs<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> as he <S%H7462>fed<s%> the <S%H2543>donkeys<s%> of <S%H6649>Zibeon<s%> his <S%H1>father.<s%>
These are the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6034>Anah:<s%> <S%H1787>Dishon<s%> and <S%H173>Oholibamah,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6034>Anah.<s%>
These are the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1787>Dishon:<s%> <S%H2533>Hemdan,<s%> <S%H790>Eshban,<s%> <S%H3506>Ithran,<s%> and <S%H3763>Cheran.<s%>
These are the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H687>Ezer:<s%> <S%H1092>Bilhan,<s%> <S%H2190>Zaavan,<s%> and <S%H6130>Akan.<s%>
These are the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1789>Dishan:<s%> <S%H5780>Uz<s%> and <S%H765>Aran.<s%>

These are the <S%H441>chiefs<s%> who came of the <S%H2752>Horites:<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H3877>Lotan,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H7732>Shobal,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H6649>Zibeon,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H6034>Anah,<s%>

<S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H1787>Dishon,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H687>Ezer,<s%> and <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H1789>Dishan:<s%> these are the <S%H441>chiefs<s%> who came of the <S%H2753>Horites,<s%> according to their <S%H441>chiefs<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8165>Seir.<s%>

These are the <S%H4428>kings<s%> who <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Edom,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> any <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> over the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
<S%H1106>Bela,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor,<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in <S%H123>Edom.<s%> The <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H1838>Dinhabah.<s%>
<S%H1106>Bela<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and <S%H3103>Jobab,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2226>Zerah<s%> of <S%H1224>Bozrah,<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>place.<s%>
<S%H3103>Jobab<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and <S%H2367>Husham<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H8489>Temanites<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>place.<s%>

<S%H2367>Husham<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and <S%H1908>Hadad,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H911>Bedad,<s%> who <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H4080>Midian<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his <S%H8034>place.<s%> The name of his <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H5762>Avith.<s%>
<S%H1908>Hadad<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and <S%H8072>Samlah<s%> of <S%H4957>Masrekah<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>place.<s%>
<S%H8072>Samlah<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and <S%H7586>Shaul<s%> of <S%H7344>Rehoboth<s%> by the <S%H5104>river,<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>place.<s%>
<S%H7586>Shaul<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and Baal <S%H1177>Hanan,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5907>Achbor<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>place.<s%>

Baal <S%H1177>Hanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5907>Achbor<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and <S%H1924>Hadar<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his <S%H8034>place.<s%> The name of his <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H6464>Pau.<s%> His <S%H802>wife<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H4105>Mehetabel,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H4308>Matred,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H4314>Mezahab.<s%>

These are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H441>chiefs<s%> who came from <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families,<s%> after their <S%H4725>places,<s%> and by their <S%H8034>names:<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H8555>Timna,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H5933>Alvah,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H3509>Jetheth,<s%>
<S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H173>Oholibamah,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H425>Elah,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H6373>Pinon,<s%>
<S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H7073>Kenaz,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H8487>Teman,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H4014>Mibzar,<s%>

<S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H4025>Magdiel,<s%> and <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H5902>Iram.<s%> These are the <S%H441>chiefs<s%> of <S%H123>Edom,<s%> according to their <S%H4186>habitations<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H272>possession.<s%> This is <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H123>Edomites.<s%>
